text: Singapore competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland. ==Athletes== The following Singaporean athletes participated in the games: === Athletics=== *Tang Pui Wah === Swimming=== *Neo Chwee Kok ===Weightlifting=== *Chay Weng Yew (6th place) *Lon Bin Mohamed Noor (8th place) *Thong Saw Pak ==References== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1952 Summer Olympics 1952 Oly
title: Singapore at the 1952 Summer Olympics
